title: Implement PGlite daemon for multi-process safety
description: Add a lightweight daemon that owns the PGlite connection and exposes it via Unix socket using @electric-sql/pglite-socket. CLI commands connect as PostgreSQL clients instead of creating their own PGlite instances, preventing database corruption from concurrent access.

title: Add pglite-socket dependency and create daemon service
Create DatabaseClient service for socket connection
description:
Create `src/services/DatabaseClient.ts` that connects to PGlite via Unix socket using node-postgres (pg). Implements same interface as Database service but proxies queries through socket.

**Status:** Implementation complete, blocked on Daemon.ts socket naming.

**Blocker:** Daemon.ts creates socket at `pglite.sock` but node-postgres expects `.s.PGSQL.5432` (PostgreSQL convention). Coordinating with Worker 1 (PureWind) for fix.
